title: a guy is trolling x2 games
body: ive been in 2 games wth a guy called balls he gets fred and blue then feed blue to mid and red to adc and just continually feeds everyone, he even convinced the enemy team to report me due to me not wanting to stay in a game for 20 mins with this guy? is there seriously nothing u can do about this guy cause if i get reported after this game im not polaying this game anymore

replies.body:
Hi jaggapuss,

**The Boards are not the right place to report things like this**
Also, can you please remove the link as [there is a strict no name and shame policy](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules). 

>In cases like this, be sure to send in a support ticket to Riot detailing exactly what happened, and any evidence you may have.

>Please keep in mind that player support is busy and it may take a lil while for them to get back to you (almost always reply within a week). During this time do not lodge multiple tickets or continue adding information to your existing ticket, as it may send your enquiry to the back of the queue.

>Also please keep in mind that Riot are unable to tell you if the player receives punishment due to privacy reasons.  

> [In the future,  definitely utilise the end of game reporting feature. Consistent reports are the only way to ensure that a player gets punished.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player)

how can u not name and shame someone for being and absolute %$%@#&^@&# they dont get punished i had to leave the next que cause i would have been 3 in a row, i think itsbetter o name and shame so people are aware that th nxt 20 mins o there life is ruined

While it is frustrating, and I understand that you want to see action taken against such a player, you have to go through the right channels. Posting on the boards about a player wont get you far.

In this case these channels are:

* End of game report (most important)
* Support ticket

We avoid naming and shaming because it can create unnecessary violence towards certain players, as well as in a way encourage people to come and post on the boards whenever somebody has a bad game, labelling them as a "feeder" or "troll.
Dude I know how you feel make sure you use the report feature in the client, or send in a support ticket, with perhaps some evidence. As a REAL Employee can look into it for you <3

Rito:
Where naming and shaming to avoid massive LP loss is wrong, but trolling and ruining the game is perfectly fine.

You can moan about anyone on the forums then, what happens if you are the one trolling? Would you like the troll to be able to do that with ritos permission? You want to reply would you? Then that would start a fight and build horrible arguments and block up the forums with ranting only... Theres always a wrong way to go about things.....
